Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 4 Saññojanagocchaka » 4.2 Saññojaniyaduka
4.2.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Saññojanagocchaka
Saññojaniyaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
39.
1416Saññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  saññojaniyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe… .
1417(Cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukasadisaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
1418Saññojaniyadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
